last_episode_to_air.name: Build a Waste-Free World
last_episode_to_air.overview: Prince William, David Attenborough and Hindou Oumarou Ibrahim see how we might reimagine our production lines to solve the problem of the vast amount of waste we produce.

name: The Earthshot Prize: Repairing Our Planet
original_name: The Earthshot Prize: Repairing Our Planet
overview: Aims to discover, celebrate and scale innovative solutions to the greatest environmental challenges facing our planet.

episodes.name: Protect & Restore Nature
episodes.overview: Sir David Attenborough introduces us to inspiring people with solutions to help restore nature, and reveals the three finalists of the first ever Earthshot Prize for Nature.

episodes.name: Fix Our Climate
episodes.overview: Prince William, Sir David Attenborough and Christiana Figueres highlight inspiring and often unexpected solutions to the climate challenge.

episodes.name: Clean Our Air
episodes.overview: Prince William, Sir David Attenborough and astronaut Naoko Yamazaki hear the personal stories of people who are directly affected by air pollution and look at possible solutions.

episodes.name: Revive Our Oceans
episodes.overview: Prince William, David Attenborough and Shakira find out about inspiring people and projects across the world that can help us stop damaging the oceans and enable their revival.

episodes.name: Build a Waste-Free World
episodes.overview: Prince William, David Attenborough and Hindou Oumarou Ibrahim see how we might reimagine our production lines to solve the problem of the vast amount of waste we produce.
